item.description:

item.title: 中国青年失业率居高不下，为雇主提供了大量可供选择的求职者，导致工资增长迟缓，并加剧了人们对中国可能难以提振家庭消费，从而稳定增长并拉动经济的担忧。
item.description:
High youth unemployment in China gives employers a large pool of candidates to choose from, keeping wage growth sluggish and cementing worries the country may struggle to boost household consumption enough to stabilize growth and lift the economy https://t.co/EHprFoBeAF

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰的企业面临着资本管制限制利润流动、难以获得保险以及美国财政和军事支持摇摆不定等问题。这些问题的累积使一些企业濒临倒闭边缘
item.description:
Corporates in Ukraine face issues with capital controls restricting the movement of profits, difficulties in getting insurance and wavering US financial and military support. The accumulation of problems has brought some to the brink of collapse https://t.co/1sXd2Kw1lB

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 分析师和投资者称，汉莎航空很可能无法实现其 2024 年的利润率目标，因为这家德国航空公司正寻求达成新的、更高的薪酬协议，以结束被迫取消数千个航班的长期罢工。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Lufthansa will likely miss its 2024 profit margin goal as the German airline seeks to agree new, higher pay deals to end prolonged strikes, which have forced it to cancel thousands of flights, analysts and investors say. More here: https://t.co/FDKEH3ierq

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 日本央行决策者呼吁全面改革超宽松货币政策

item.title: 独家报道欧洲中央银行在未来几年将继续为市场利率设定 "下限"，但银行在决定自己需要多少流动性方面将发挥更大作用。更多内容请点击此处：
item.description:
Exclusive: The European Central Bank will continue putting a ‘floor’ under market interest rates in the years to come, but banks will play a greater role in deciding how much liquidity they want. More here: https://t.co/rhgCjLrrnb

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 八家欧盟消费者组织要求监察机构对 Facebook 的所有者采取行动，因为该公司涉嫌在收集用户数据时违反了欧盟的隐私规则。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Meta was hit with privacy complaints as eight EU consumer groups asked watchdogs to act against the Facebook owner for allegedly breaching the bloc's privacy rules when it hoovers up user data. More here: https://t.co/sK7aDgnPyn

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 印度和南非在阿布扎比举行的世界贸易组织会议上对一项投资协议提出正式反对，阻止该协议的通过，观察家们认为此举可能会阻止数千亿美元的投资。
item.description:
India and South Africa have filed a formal objection against an investment agreement at a World Trade Organization meeting in Abu Dhabi, blocking its adoption in a move that observers say could block hundreds of billions of dollars in investment https://t.co/5zqKUoy5oA pic.twitter.com/doXSn5705I

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 杜蕾斯的所有者利洁时希望中国消费者对直播购物的嗜好也能延伸到安全套的购买上，但该公司要想在价值 50 多亿美元的安全套市场上分得一杯羹，就必须遵守 "微妙的底线"。
item.description:
Durex-owner Reckitt is hoping that Chinese consumers' penchant for livestream shopping will also extend to purchases of condoms, but the company will have to toe a ‘delicate line’ as it looks to grow its slice of the $5-billion-plus condom market https://t.co/DJo4xfPN1U

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 工会称澳大利亚西太平洋银行各部门裁员 132 人

item.title: 观看：美国股市收盘下跌，因为预计将公布一份重要的通胀报告，该报告可能会极大地影响人们对美联储决定何时降息的预期
item.description:
WATCH: US stocks ended lower in anticipation of a crucial inflation report that could significantly shape expectations regarding the Federal Reserve's decision on the timing of an interest rate cut https://t.co/Tchrle6dGY pic.twitter.com/KWljwmRRYt

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 比特币的疯狂活动使其有望创下三年多来的最大月涨幅，而且由于现金涌入上市比特币基金推动了比特币的全面反弹，比特币也有望创下历史新高。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Frenetic activity in bitcoin put it on course for its biggest monthly gain in more than three years and it is within range of a record high as cash rushing to listed bitcoin funds propels a sweeping rally. More here: https://t.co/BbD4bYa4oN

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 在南非物流问题频发的情况下，时装零售商正加紧本地生产，试图利用其他海港和空运来缓解港口拥堵造成的大量库存交付延误。更多信息
item.description:
Amid South Africa's logistics problems, fashion retailers are ramping up local production as they try to use alternative seaports and air freight to mitigate the impact of congestion at ports that has caused massive delays in stock deliveries. Read more: https://t.co/icPqg1gst1 pic.twitter.com/tYcMtCRk7p

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 印度信实公司与迪斯尼公司的合并吸引了信实公司老板穆克什-安巴尼的妻子妮塔-安巴尼重返主流商业领域，担任新公司的董事长，她在艺术和体育领域的经验以及与宝莱坞的联系将派上用场。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
The Reliance-Disney India merger has attracted Nita Ambani, wife of Reliance boss Mukesh Ambani, back into mainstream business as the new company's chair, where her experience in arts and sports, and ties with Bollywood could come in handy. More here: https://t.co/KRUy7IVcQU

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024
